description: Squares which when digits are rotated left once remain square.
comments: Those resulting in leading zeros are excluded.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Square Number
mathematica: okQ[n_]:=Module[{idn=IntegerDigits[n]},idn[[2]]!=0&&IntegerQ[Sqrt[ FromDigits[RotateLeft[idn]]]]]; Join[{1,4,9},Select[Range[4,320000]^2, okQ]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 30 2011 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Nov 15 1998.
